Draft Rating:

F

Rod Higgins ranks in the 14th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Higgins's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 11 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Derrick Brown with 40th pick but was worth 24th pick.
  • Drafted Jared Dudley with 22th pick but was worth 10th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Gerald Henderson with 12th pick but was worth 49th pick.
  • Drafted D.J. Augustin with 9th pick but was worth 40th pick.
  • Drafted Alexis Ajinça with 20th pick but was worth 33th pick.

F

Rod Higgins ranks in the 6th percentile for trading among executives in our database.

  • Lost Brandan Wright to GSW.
Their biggest L:

  • Lost Alexis Ajinça, Tyson Chandler to DAL.
